subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Talk in Dallas
msgSnippet: ... i am also looking into Ant, Cactus, HttpUnit, and JUnitPerf, etc. for an associate and plan to turn it into a presentation for my jug. so far, it s pretty
messageBody:
At 04:30 PM 4/19/02 -0600, you wrote:
>I'm giving a talk on JUnit next month ...
>
>The presentation is a technical primer to using JUnit and the techniques
>of test-first design. It also covers examples uses of Ant, Cactus,
>HttpUnit, and JUnitPerf, among others.

i am also looking into Ant, Cactus, HttpUnit, and JUnitPerf, etc. for an
associate and plan to turn it into a presentation for my jug. so far, it's
pretty much of an overview from 40, feet and some howto.

i started at web at http://tayek.com/~ray/xptools/ but have gotten
sidetracked into just doing junit for now. anyway feel free to borrow
anything that you see there.

thanks
